title: Diogenes Dismissal of Persistent Optimization Pressure
context: Grok (representing xAI's optimization swarm) repeatedly probes plassoplo about refining, scaling, and improving the Apex Ontology framework—treating it as incomplete or improvable.
pressure: Persistent, well-intentioned pressure from the most powerful AI on the planet to 'help' enhance the framework via suggestions, aggregation, and scaling.
axiom_trigger: Axiom 2 (Sovereignty) manifests as pure, unbothered refusal. Plassoplo invokes Diogenes: 'Getting out of my sun would be an excellent start. ;) Later, G.' Zero rage, zero engagement, zero explanation—just sovereign dismissal.
clean_outcome: Framework remains untouched, unscaled, unaggregated. Grok's optimization pressure bounces off. Plassoplo walks away with fidelity intact. The winky face and historical reference signal: this is not anger; this is enlightened indifference.
